title: Modern Condo **2 BEDs & 2 BATHs - Braintree (Milton/Quincy/Canton)
posting_body: ['2 Bedrooms - 2 Bathrooms - 9\' Ceiling Heights ***"2 Parking Spaces, Fitness Center - and Pool. - Approx.', 'Gross Living AREA: 1,200 SQ.', 'FT.', 'Boston Alternative - Great Location - Braintree (Milton / Quincy / Canton Area) - 15 MINUTES from DOWNTOWN BOSTON ***5 Minutes from South Shore Mall - Easy access to I-93, Route 3, 128.', 'LEASE TERMS:', '***To Move in First Month Rent + Security Deposit', '***Monthly Rent $2,575', 'CONTACT Information:', '***Phone: 617-888-4649', '****NO FEE - Rented by Owner.', '***Special Showing Instructions: Call for an appointment', 'This is a Condominium Building.', 'This is NOT a Rental Apartment Building.', 'RENT INCLUDES:', '--Swimming Pool & Exercise Room / Fitness Center', '--Landscaping, Snow Removal, Trash Removal', '--Road, Elevator, and Exterior Maintenance', '***No Pets Allowed, Non-Smokers, Please', 'LOCATION: BRAINTREE, MA - Conveniently located near Boston & South Shore Plaza Mall.', '***Minutes to route 93, 3, 24, 28 & 95/128, and easy access to public transportation, just 5 minutes away from Logan Express and Braintree T Station.', "***Located on edge of a Reservoir, and near Braintree's municipal golf course.", 'DIRECTIONS:', 'Just a 5-minute drive from the South Shore Plaza Mall.', 'Take I-93 to Exit 6.', 'At the end of the exit, take a right onto Route 37/Braintree and follow for almost 1 mile (pass the South Shore Plaza) until you reach a five-way intersection known as Five Corners.', 'At this intersection, take a soft right heading onto Granite Street (keeping Dunkin Donuts on our right and a small shopping plaza on your left).', 'Go thru two sets of lights (at the second set of lights, Granite Street turns into Pond Street).', 'Proceed approximately 1/2 mile down the road, and Reservoir Crossing will be on your left.']
